- 2 -
The Commission stated that it was not, at this time,
proposing specific rule amendments because of the questions raised
and the numerous rule changes which ma.y be required. Comments in
the Inquiry may be filed on or before June 27, 1968 with reply
comments due on or before July 26, 1968.
Action by the Commission March 27, 1968 by Notice of Inquiry.
Commissioners Hyde (Chairman), Lee, Cox, Loevinger, Wadsworth and
Johnson.
- FCC -
